metadata.title: CVE-2017-12426 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE) before 8.17.8,9.0.x before 9.0.13, 9.1.x before 9.1.10, 9.2.x before 9.2.10, 9.3.x before9.3.10, and 9.4.x before 9.4.4 might allow remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a crafted SSH URL in a project import.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
